name: CLP_NDC_RELATED
description: This table holds the National Drug Code (NDC) information on the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This is the claim record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ID
columns.description: This is the National Drug Code ID.

columns.name: NDC_CODE_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_NUMBER
columns.description: This is the National Drug Code number.

columns.name: NDC_QTY
columns.description: This is the National Drug Code quantity.

columns.name: NDC_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description: This holds the units of the drug. The units are billing appropriate.

columns.name: CLAIM_LINE_PTR
columns.description: This field points to a claim line.

columns.name: ERX_ID
columns.description: This item holds the medication ID.

columns.name: COMPOUND_LINK_NUM
columns.description: This holds the Link Sequence Number used to associate ingredients of a compound drug.
